sentences.en: 'But you write it very elegantly,'said O'Brien.'
sentences.cn: “ 但是你的文章写得很漂亮, ” 奥勃良说.

sentences.en: All 300 elegantly furnished rooms have private bath.
sentences.cn: 300个布置讲究的房间全都配有独立浴室。

sentences.en: He was elegantly dressed in a grey suit, blue shirt and paisley tie.
sentences.cn: 他衣冠楚楚，穿着灰色西服、蓝色衬衫，系着一条佩斯利花纹领带。
她的房子装饰得特别高雅.

sentences.en: In Hyde Park, elegantly attired riders centered on Rotten Row.
sentences.cn: 海德公园里, 服饰华丽的骑手们站着林荫道策马慢跑.

sentences.en: Lovett's main contribution lay in elegantly sarcastic phrases.
sentences.cn: 洛维特的主要贡献就是说了一些措辞文雅的挖苦话.

sentences.en: Neck strong, of moderate thickness and length, elegantly arched and intoshoulders.
sentences.cn: 颈部结实, 中等粗细和长度, 呈优雅的弧线形,与肩部结合简洁.

sentences.en: On the other day , tall elegantly welcomed her 18 th birthday.
sentences.cn: 日前,乔娜迎来了她的18岁生日.

sentences.en: She dressed very simply and elegantly in short plaid skirts and waists of knitted silk.
sentences.cn: 她身穿方格子的绒布短裙和丝织的上衣,相当朴素而入时.

sentences.en: She turned on her elegantly shod heel.
sentences.cn: 她突然转身，迈开穿着雅致的皮鞋的双脚离去了。

sentences.en: She's a lovely mover , ie moves ( eg dances ) elegantly .
Thanks to all of the polish, the essay reads fluently and elegantly.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章修改后读起来通顺而优美.

sentences.en: The ultimate issue is your ability to think about and conceptualize 'something to say' and once you have done that, find the language that allows you to say it most directly and elegantly.
sentences.cn: 最终的问题在于你对“要说的东西”进行思考和概念化的能力，一旦你拥有了这种能力，那么就要找到一种语言，让你可以更直接且优美地表达出来。

sentences.en: While you all do things elegantly, I do things crudely.
sentences.cn: 好吧,你们都是来“雅”的, 我来点儿“俗”的.

sentences.en: Woman tends to dress more elegantly or more showily.
sentences.cn: 妇女通常穿得更雅致或更引人注目.
